column4: I think my ubuntu is broken! I can't get anything except what camew with it to work!
I think my ubuntu is broken! I can't get anything except what camew with it to work!
I think my brand new ubuntu is broken! I can't get anything except what camew with it to work!
nothing will run
i tried all my regular stuff, photoshop, some games, quicktime, itunes, all wont run
wait, so nothing you buy in a store will work on linux?!?! SO WHAT THE **** WILL?!
so who shells out the money for ubuntu to make the software?
the community makes the software!
that's because youve seen windows
ubuntu isn't just free as in price. it's free as in you can do whatever you want with the source code (the authors do not restrict your rights)
ok, so what software do you need?
yes. that is the point :)
as long as the people who modify it and release it allow others to do the same.
YES
companies make money off it by selling corporate support (eg 24/7 phoneline etc)
yep, as long as you provide the source code.
nah, you don't need a shell ;) init will just sleep
at least give linux a chance. you'll come to love it.
don't try wine first. try native linux programs first.
no, it is BETA
you can install new software using   system -> adminstration -> synaptic package manager
don't use add/remove (it is way inferior to syaptic)
